thread.title: How Texas airports stack up for affordability
thread.title_full: How Texas airports stack up for affordability

author: Olivia Pulsinelli
title: How Texas airports stack up for affordability
text:
Sergiy Trofimov One Texas airport cracked the top five on Cheapflights.com’s Sixth Annual Airport… more One Texas airport cracked the top five on Cheapflights.com’s Sixth Annual Airport Affordability Index — but it wasn’t in Houston. That honor goes to Dallas Love Field (DAL), which moved up one spot from the 2014 list to take the No. 3 spot. In fact, no Houston airport even made the top 30. William P. Hobby Airport (HOU) took the No. 32 spot, up from No. 42 the year before. George Bush Intercontinental Airport (IAH) moved up to No. 41 from the No. 63 spot last year. The list is based on the airports’ average airfares to a variety of popular domestic and international destinations that travelers found on Cheapflights.com during the month of June. Hobby and Bush had average airfare of $337 and $356, respectively, according to Cheapflights. Dallas Love Field’s average airfare for June was $251, tying with New York’s La Guardia (LGA). Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky International (CVG) ranks No. 1 with $199, Atlanta International (ATL) is No. 2 with $231, and Chicago-O’Hare International rounds out the top five with $265. Cheapflights acknowledged there was a lot of movement throughout the list — of the top five airports, all except DAL ranked below No. 30 last year. Many of the top-ranked airports recently have seen an upswing in passenger seats by discount airlines, a press release from the website notes. Here are all the Texas airports that made the list of 101 popular airports and how they ranked based on their average airfare for June on Cheapflights.com: No. 3: Dallas Love Field, TX (DAL), $251 No. 16: Austin-Bergstrom International, TX (AUS), $293 No. 29: Dallas/Fort Worth International, TX (DFW), $332 No. 32: William P. Hobby, TX (HOU), $337 No. 41: George Bush Intercontinental, TX (IAH), $356 No. 71: San Antonio International, TX (SAT), $434 No. 95: El Paso International, TX (ELP), $554
